::The Oblitercons/Scattershot/Punch::

Dark One smiles as he sees Iron Raptor slump down to the floor. He turns 
around to look at Scattershot and Punch. "Why are you two here?"

"We were sent to relieve you guys. There's something up outside that needed 
your attention," Punch replies, Scattershot nodding like an idiot, 
DeathStorm's head nearly falling off of his.

Dark One nods. "Very well, we'll go then. Don't let these two escape."

Dark One walks out, motioning for the other Oblitercons to follow him. Hiss 
kicks Iron Raptor's body a few times before turning to follow Dark One, the 
other Oblitercons doing the same (following Dark One, not kicking Iron 
Raptor).

Punch turns back to the prisoners.

"Defences," he says simply, several autoguns dropping out of the cealing at 
that command.

"Allright," he says, looking at Tavatron, "Back into that corner," Punch 
waves his gun at the apropriate corner, "VERY slowly. Any sudden moves from 
either of you and the autoguns open fire. Scattershot, drag the other one to 
the other corner."

Scattershot nods, dragging Iron Raptor off toward the other corner.
